sample_docs: MENU MENU What We deliver authentication solutions to protect against fraud, across any channel Our authentication modules are designed to be used individually or layered together AimAnomaly AI-based pattern detection to flag potential fraud as early as onboarding and throughout the session AimBehaviour Continuous, invisible user authentication to passively monitor for changes in behaviour AimFace Facial authentication module deployable across any channel using a camera AimVoice Language- and dialect-agnostic voice authentication deployable across any channel with a microphone AimFace//LipSync Unique technology that combines facial authentication with audio and lip movement BIDaaS: Our underlying platform The server-side platform at the heart of our multimodal authentication approach Why What do you need biometrics to do? From fraud prevention to cost reduction, biometric authentication helps you achieve your objectives Prevent and disrupt fraud From as early as onboarding, monitor and protect against in-session fraud Onboard new customers faster Streamline the onboarding process to support customer growth targets Simplify the user experience Use everyday device technology to leverage invisible and visible security to protect your users Reduce costs Fast ROI and elimination of bottom-line costs such as SMS push notifications Support compliance requirements Secure, privacy-first user auth to comply with the existing and upcoming regulations such as PSD2 Apply the right level of friction Passive and active security to deploy the right amount of friction - no more, no less How Our approach is designed for faster, easier and smarter deployments Everything we have built has been architected with your success in mind Server-side authentication Scalable, rapid deployments and a model that authenticates across any channel and device Powered by deep learning Benefit from our continued research in, and applications of, deep learning Biometric integration sandbox Free tools to trial integration and deployment, complete with 1000 API calls a month Rapid pilot-to-production Comprehensive support throughout the integration to support aggressive, rapid rollout Biometric risk threshold modelling Get support on your risk configurations to align with your security and UX objectives Developers AimBrain: built by engineers, for engineers Integrate stronger, smoother user authentication with our web and mobile SDKs, open API and free dashboard for developers AimBrain On Demand Explore and trial our free-for-life biometric authentication dashboard for developers Dashboard documentation Quick Start guide to your dashboard, including a step-by-step trial integration with our CLI SDKs Access our web and native iOS and Android SDKs API Access the AimBrain API Login Login to your dashboard About Discover AimBrain Jobs, news, resources and more News & media Read all about it! Check out our updates and media mentions. Check out our blog for AimBrain musings Partners Join our expanding network of world-class technology partners Partners Join our expanding network of world-class technology partners Detect and stop (60%+) more fraud, before it impacts your business. Industrialised fraud demands a powerful defence against the impact of breached credentials, bot attacks and account takeovers. Use invisible and visible biometric tools to defend your business against bad users and fraud. Monitor sessions for fraud, from enrolment to logout. Protect your customers, business and reputation from the tidal wave of cybercrime. In the digital era, few businesses are immune to the threat of fraud and the losses it incurs. Our tools detect and prevent fraud, faster and more accurately than ever before. Detect and block bad enrolments, fraudulent logins and account takeovers, and add stronger user verification with a biometric authentication step-up. AimBrain stops more fraud. Simpler, smarter, stronger authentication that stops fraud before it damages. 1 We detect new account fraud We detect and flag the new account fraud anomalies that will result in fraud losses, invisibly. Real-time risk scores at the manual account opening stage help you rate the risk and deal with it appropriately. We detect new account fraud 2 We spot users likely to abuse rewards If your business relies on rewards or incentives to attract new customers, protect yourself from those looking to abuse the benefits open to them by scoring their behaviour, invisibly. We spot users likely to abuse rewards 3 We isolate automated attacks Bot attacks can quickly immobilise a business, causing downtime issues and high investigative costs. Spot and isolate new automated attacks quickly, to block and contain new attempts. We isolate automated attacks 4 We protect against account takeover fraud Just because a user has the right credentials doesn't mean they're legitimate. Using invisible, continuous authentication, monitor known user behaviour to flag changes that could signify account takeover , including trojan activations within authenticated sessions. Block, investigate or green-light the transaction in real-time. We protect against account takeover fraud 5 We provide user-friendly step-up auth Select from three additional, user-friendly modules: AimFace , AimVoice & AimFace//Lipsync , to test for liveness and authenticate users in a low-friction way. We provide user-friendly step-up auth 6 We make it all easy for you Immediately and infinitely scalable, easily deployable and available across any application, device or channel, it's never been easier to stop fraud in a customer-friendly way. We make it all easy for you We're authenticating more than 300 million requests per month, helping businesses all over the world protect themselves from fraud. Industry recognition Winners: Andrius Sutas and Alesis Novik Identity and Access Management Upscale Programme 2018 Winner H2Ventures and KPMG Fintech100 2017 Fintech Challenge Winner 2016 Previous Next What do you want to do? Whatever your strategic objectives, our biometric authentication tools make that a reality. Detect and prevent fraud From as early as onboarding, protect against fraud before it damages. Simplify the user experience Wherever and whenever, make customer authentication easier with biometrics. Comply with regulation From AML to SCA, use biometrics to support your compliance objectives. Reduce costs Cut costs and get a faster ROI with our scalable model and simple pricing. Onboard quickly & compliantly Reduce onboarding friction in support of your growth targets. Reduce friction Step-up and step-down to maintain security and convenience. Built for simplicity, scalability and security We give you the tools, consultancy and support you need for your individual specification. Modelling Consultative threshold modelling to suit your risk. deployment Proven framework for rapid pilot-to-production Scalable Architecture that auto-scales with your business Features Access and configuration for all modules. Custom roi Pricing for economies of scale and a rapid ROI. Local, national, global – we're securing some of the biggest names You're in good hands when you choose AimBrain. Whatever your use case, we'll design the solution. We're helping an APAC digital bank offer remote onboarding and an enhanced login/step-up authentication experience with AimFace. We're helping a digital bank utilising blockchain to provide facial authentication for login & step-up, for its entire user base. We're helping a global Wealth Management bank improve account visibility by offering AimFace as a way to view investment portfolios. We're working with a global credit card provider to reduce fraudulent account opening at the onboarding stage, by using AimAnomaly Detection to flag suspicious enrolments. We're helping a European FS technology provider offer liveness detection to its clients, using AimFace facial authentication. We're working with a global Cloud Service Provider to red flag instances of account-opening fraud, using AimAnomaly Detection. We're working with a digital banking platform to provide biometric authentication to its new digital banking clients. about AimBrain Resources Access our whitepapers, fact sheets and videos.
